attributes.action: repeal the Communications Data Bill/Communications Data Act
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the government to drop all plans to record telephone conversations, e-mails, text messages and web pages visited in the United Kingdom. 

We petition the government to safeguard the privacy of British citizens, not undermine it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
